claim_data.description:
A causa di un ricovero ospedaliero urgente il 14 aprile 2017 presso l'Ospedale Renzetti di Lanciano, non sono riuscita a utilizzare il biglietto ferroviario acquistato per quello stesso giorno.

Allego alla presente il certificato di ricovero a supporto della mia richiesta.

Chiedo gentilmente il rimborso.

llm_decision.explanation: The claim is approved because the claimant, Piccirilli Francesca, was hospitalized on April 14, 2017, the same day as her train ticket. The provided medical certificate from Azienda Sanitaria Locale N. 2 Lanciano P.O. "Renzetti" confirms her hospitalization on that date. The certificate has a visible stamp and signature, and the name on the certificate matches the claimant's name. The train ticket also confirms the booking details. The current date is 2017-05-11, which is within 30 days of the policy expiration. The hospitalization prevents her from using the train ticket on the scheduled date.
